itemInfo.itemDesc: Damage Against Demihuman +10 for 5 min.\n- Cooldown : 10 min.

item.name: Sinner's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Sinner's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Arrow Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Plunder. Arrow Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Fir Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Fir Trees with a Fluid Collector.
